fields.name: Best Weapon:
fields.value:
__Favonius Lance__ - The energy generated by the weapons passive is not to be underestimated as it can generate energy for the whole team.

__Deathmatch__ - The high CRIT Rate substat will increase the CRIT Rate Rosaria gives from her Ascension 1 talent while also boosting her own personal damage.

fields.name: Replacement Weapon:
fields.value: Primordial Jade Winged-Spear, Staff of Homa, The Catch

fields.name: Main Stats Priority
fields.value: <sands>  ATK% or Energy Recharge | <goblet>  Cryo DMG Bonus | <circlet>  CRIT Rate

fields.name: Talent Priority
fields.value:
**1)** Elemental Burst: Rites of Termination
**2)** Elemental Skill: Ravaging Confession
**3)** Normal Attack: Spear of the Church
